title: "Mage itemization is balanced"
body:
https://i.imgur.com/vT3LdxG.jpg)]

Funniest thing I've heard all week, when is mage itemization finally getting some well deserved nerfs?
When is this {{item:3165}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3135}} combo getting addressed? I'm more scared of mages who build this than I am of any assassin

replies.body:
so what your saying is... he is full build... he has over 1000 AP..  fully stacked {{item:3041}} ,19 kills, and as much pen as he can get... and he still cant 1 shot you from 75% hp?

glad we cleared that up.

 because  i know a hell of a lot of AD champions that can, from full hp , and with a hell of a lot less.

Level 18 full build glass cannon does good damage against a glass cannon who's playing from behind, but can't actually kill them without full combo.

wow much zap very leg room

Like having {{item:3285}} {{item:3089}} and 25 stacks of {{item:3041}} didn't help abit...

A 19/2/9 Xerath with that build and stacks should be able to oneshot (and he doesn't as shown by you) any squishy which is even 2 levels behind and most likely without any MR item. 

Also consider that I've seen Caitlyn doing 2x that damage with AAs while far less fed and against ppl itemized to counter her.
I'm pretty sure if you were a Rengar or Kha with that amount of kills you would've done the same with a single auto + Q
And would have to be in range to do it instead of 1500 units 4 sec cd spammable Q that is also an AOE

fo real. 

Mages can easily get enough magic pen to negate most champion's base stats by 12 min into the game. 33 magic pen from just 2600g is wild.

Until you learn that you need to spend 450 gold to counter it. A purchase of a Hexdrinker already hard counters any mage, because their combo will now be on cooldown and you still have around 40% HP left to kill them.
1k AP. I don't think Voidstaff is the problem in that picture.
So mages should be useless end game while all ad champs deal true damage burst to you? No thanks.
Its true, even ap assassins are abusing mage items now because they are so broken (like ludens).
this just in "ap champions are buying items that increase ap dmg" now tom with the weather
